hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals the #Royal Family's Tomb#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #1# major item.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Iron Boots#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Slingshot# and #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

GC (Maze).text: This is a haiku&Five syllables then seven&Five more to finish
